title.rendered: Healthmine Appoints Senior Sales Leadership With Multiple Hires Focused On Payer And ACO Market Penetration.

content.rendered: Chartwell Partners engaged with HealthMine, a leading provider of quality measures for health plans and risk bearing providers, to drive market penetration through the recruitment of seasoned business development leaders. Our partnership resulted in the recruitment of three Vice Presidents of Business Development. Tony Kucera, formerly of Optum’s Verify Health; Jennifer Maze, formerly of LifeLine Healthcare; and Nancy Scheufele, formerly of Episource have joined the organization and lead business development with Kent Holdcroft, the EVP and Chief Growth Officer.
